name: Anonymized Internet Traces IPv6 Day/Launch
description: This dataset contains three anonymized passive traffic traces from CAIDA's equinix-chicago and equinix-sanjose monitors on high-speed Internet backbone links taken during IPv6 Day on 8 June 2011, and three additional traces from the equinix-sanjose monitor taken during IPv6 Launch Day on 6 June 2012 (the Chicago monitors were offline on IPv6 Launch Day).
